data.title: Convert Pounds Sterling (GBP) and Hungarian Forints (HUF): Currency Exchange Rate Conversion Calculator
data.meta_description: Calculator to convert money in Pound Sterling (GBP) to and from Hungarian Forint (HUF) using up to date exchange rates.
data.text:
This Pound Sterling and Hungarian Forint convertor is up to date with exchange rates from August 18, 2024.

Enter the amount to be converted in the box to the left of Pound Sterling. Use "Swap currencies" to make Hungarian Forint the default currency. Click on Hungarian Forints or Pounds Sterling to convert between that currency and all other currencies.

Pound Sterling is the currency in Channel Islands (Aldernay, Guernsey, Jersey, Sark), Isle of Man, and United Kingdom (England, Great Britain, Northern Ireland, Scotland, Wales, UK, GB, GBR). The Hungarian Forint is the currency in Hungary (HU, HUN). Pound Sterling is also known as the British Pound, the United Kingdom Pound, UKP, STG, the English Pound, British Pound Sterling, BPS, and Sterlings. The symbol for HUF can be written Ft. Pound Sterling is divided into 100 pence. The exchange rate for Pound Sterling was last updated on August 18, 2024 from The International Monetary Fund. The exchange rate for the Hungarian Forint was last updated on June 5, 2023 from MSN. The GBP conversion factor has 6 significant digits. The HUF conversion factor has 5 significant digits.
